argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invfval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | invfval.n | |- N = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 3 |  | invfval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | invfval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | invfval.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 6 |  | isoval.n | |- I = ( Iso ` C ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_invfun | |- ( ph -> Fun ( X N Y ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_funfn | |- ( Fun ( X N Y ) <-> ( X N Y ) Fn dom ( X N Y ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( X N Y ) Fn dom ( X N Y ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_isoval | |- ( ph -> ( X I Y ) = dom ( X N Y ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fneq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( X N Y ) Fn ( X I Y ) <-> ( X N Y ) Fn dom ( X N Y ) ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> ( X N Y ) Fn ( X I Y ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_df-rn | |- ran ( X N Y ) = dom `' ( X N Y ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_invsym2 | |- ( ph -> `' ( X N Y ) = ( Y N X ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( ph -> dom `' ( X N Y ) = dom ( Y N X ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 4, 6 | #P_isoval | |- ( ph -> ( Y I X ) = dom ( Y N X ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> dom `' ( X N Y ) = ( Y I X ) ) |
| 18 | 13, 17 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> ran ( X N Y ) = ( Y I X ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqimss | |- ( ran ( X N Y ) = ( Y I X ) -> ran ( X N Y ) C_ ( Y I X ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ran ( X N Y ) C_ ( Y I X ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_df-f | |- ( ( X N Y ) : ( X I Y ) --> ( Y I X ) <-> ( ( X N Y ) Fn ( X I Y ) /\ ran ( X N Y ) C_ ( Y I X ) ) ) |
| 22 | 12, 20, 21 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> ( X N Y ) : ( X I Y ) --> ( Y I X ) ) |
